jobs.title: Technical Support Specialist
description: Google Inc. is hiring a Technical Support Specialist in Dhaka, Bangladesh to support a growing product portfolio.
You will partner with product, design, and business teams to plan, build, and launch measurable improvements.
Ownership spans discovery, delivery, launch, and follow-up analysis so we can move quickly but carefully.
requirements: Hands-on experience delivering technical support specialist solutions for global users.
Solid understanding of agile planning, testing, and code review best practices.
Ability to break down ambiguous problems into iterative milestones.
Excellent communication skills in English; Vietnamese is a plus.
desirable: Experience presenting work to leadership and clients.
Comfort using data and experiments to guide decisions.
Enthusiasm for mentoring and sharing knowledge across teams.
benefits: Competitive salary reviews twice per year.
Flexible PTO policy and remote-friendly working setup.
Annual health check and premium insurance package.
Company-sponsored workshops, clubs, and community events.
jobs.education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
